mdRecord.dcterms:title: Geological map of the Potomac basin west of Blue Ridge, Virginia and West Virginia: showing the relations of its upper Potomac coal basin and iron-ore bearing areas in reference to the West Virginia Central and Pittsburg [sic] R.R., and its connections and extensions / compiled from surveys by W.B. Rogers and others by Jed. Hotchkiss, Consulting Eng., etc., Staunton, Va., 1882 ; A. Hoen & Co., Photo. Lith., Baltimore
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hotchkiss, Jedediah, 1828-1899 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : b&w ; 35 x 57 cm. on sheet 44 x 61 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes cross-section at top right: Geological section across Georges Creek coal basin and eastward (scale 6000' to 1") by Prof. I.C. White, May 1881, Trans. Am. Phil. Soc. [original]
From The Virginias, v. 3, no. 5, May 1882. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Hotchkiss B; mounted on linen. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Geology--Potomac River Valley--Maps
